page.title: 15Arts and Crafts
page.content: There is a diversity of homebased crafts. The Women's Institute arrange Autumn evening classes : lampshade making , tapestry, dress making, upholstery, copper tooling, macrame, embroidery, patchwork (One farmer's wife is crotcheting from{century old patterns) ,flower arranging talents show at Harvest Festivals. One expert demonstrates her expertise in{bobbin lace, tatting, spinning and {dyeing local wool and weaving.}Her father draws old houses and mills which serve as local records. Joy- making, bookmarkers and pictures raise money for the N.S.P.C.C. Among other crafts are Gilding and Fabric designing. Wares sold include Camhawn candles, wooden and slate pictures, teapot stands and{haute couture knitwear.
